IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: The Union fights for individual rights and fundamental freedoms for all. The Union's activities include fostering, protecting, extending and obtaining civil liberty rights through educational, legal, legislative and community action.
IRS990.MissionDesc: American Civil Liberties Union of San Diego & Imperial Counties, Inc. (the "Union") is a California Nonprofit Corporation incorporated on December 23, 1988. The Union fights for individual rights and fundamental freedoms for all. The Union's activities include fostering, protecting, extending and obtaining civil liberty rights through educational, legal, legislative and community action.
IRS990.Desc: The Union fights for individual rights and fundamental freedoms for all. The Union's activities include fostering, protecting, extending and obtaining civil liberty rights through educational, legal, legislative and community action.

OtherAssetsOrgGrp.Desc: DUE FROM ACLU FOUNDATION OF SD & IM CTY

OtherLiabilitiesOrgGrp.Desc: DUE TO ACLU OF SD & IMPERIAL COUNTIES

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: The Organization believes that it has appropriate support for any tax positions taken, and as such, does not have any uncertain tax positions that are material to the financial statements.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Part I, Line 1a: Relevant information in regards to selections on 1a.
Form 990, Part VI, Line 11b: Form 990 Review Process
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE DRAFT FORM 990 IS REVIEWED BY THE BUDGET AND FINANCE COMMITTEE, THE EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR, AND THE TREASURER WHO PROVIDES THE INFORMATION TO THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Line 12c: Explanation of Monitoring and Enforcement of Conflicts
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: Annually every member of the Board receives and completes a conflict of interest questionnaire. When returned, it is reviewed by the Executive Director. If there are any questions, it is referred to the President of the Board.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Line 19: Other Organization Documents Publicly Available
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: The Union's most recent annual audited financial statements, 990 and governing documents are available upon request. Form 990 is also available on Guidestar.
